JobFullDesc: Alliances Account Executive, Global AlliancesRemote United StatesOur success is built on strong partnerships, all around the world. Powerful connections drive our business forward and shape the future of innovation at Dell Technologies. Dedicated individuals in Alliances within Outside Sales are at the heart of it all. It’s about the big picture, developing global alliance strategies for the organization, building the kind of unique value propositions that can only come from robust, insightful relationships. And it’s about potent specifics – perfectly positioning software solutions to match Alliance partner portfolios.Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as an Alliances Account Executive on our Global Alliances team in the Midwest United States.What you’ll achieveAs a Alliances Account Executive, you will be responsible for working with Dell’s largest Global Alliances Partners & Dell Technologies internal teams to execute on a regional strategy within the Americas; responsibilities include building executive relationships across the Global Alliances community, drive partner capabilities to and through Dell’s field sellers, and driving new opportunity generation & cross sell initiatives.  The core mission for this individual will be to identify, and expand the incremental Sell-Out, Sell-With and Resell business within the Global Alliance partner communities through joint offerings and strong field alignment.You will:Be responsible for ongoing opportunities, pipeline creation, management and closure of revenueExecute on a Global Strategy and Tactical engagements in AmericasBe the “Face of the Partnership” within a given regionStrategize, create, and drive new joint offerings to accelerate next generation business outcomesEngage in complex and transformational sales campaigns through formal presentations, executive briefings, and field eventsTake the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:Essential RequirementsExperience in selling to Global Alliance partnersProven track record of engaging at the CxO level & ability to navigate large matrix-based organizations2+ years of complex and transformative sales experienceDeep knowledge on how to create joint GTM messaging and offering portfoliosStrong communication skills with the ability to collaborate across several different functions/regions.Desired RequirementsBachelor’s DegreeHere’s our story; now tell us yoursDell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress. What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more. We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today. You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.Application closing date: August 2021Dell is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Dell are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Dell will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Dell encourages applicants of all ages. Read the full Employment Opportunity Policy here.
